markdownRemark.html:
What did I spend my time on today

I got to spend more time with my parents today, going out and exploring more of Austin again. We went down and checked out South Congress and listened to some of the great live music that is available around here. I am still in awe of how many places there are to check out here and experience. Over the past few years I’ve definitely started to acknowledge the shortness of life and put more of a focus on spending more time with the people I care about. It’s easy to forget that time is the most valuable resource we have. At the same time, we all tend to spend it carelessly.

Random thoughts from the day

One thing that has been on my mind a lot lately is how to work on growing my income streams. I don’t want to work for someone else forever. In order to avoid that, I need to diversify how I make my money. While a bulk will continue to be from my day job, I want to find some websites or even properties that can start paying me.

frontmatter.title: Daily Thoughts: February 8
frontmatter.description: Just a daily log of my thoughts and what I'm working on today.
